SocialLit is Social Marketing suite. It is also social media marketing tool that help you to boost your Social Media Business strategy to the next level . Write post to your social accounts at once and schedule post and mega collection of social features

Key Features

Auto Posting

Write Once post everywhere. Posting your social media was never been so easy. We made Powerful autoposting system for your. You can post your content to all your socail media at once with powerful content creator

Content Creator

Creating content for your social media was never been so easy. Create your content real quick. You can translate your content into another language easily

Features

Facebook

  • Manage Facebook Pages
  • Manage Facebook Groups
  • Manage Conversations of all facebook pages
  • Campaign
  • Capture facebook page Data
  • Facebook Messenger Bot
  • Facebook Mass Send
  • Website Integration ( Integrate Messenger to your website )
  • Facebook Scraper
  • RSS to Facebook
  • Web to Facebook

Twitter

  • Manage your tweets
  • Write tweet
  • Send direct message

  • Mass retweet
  • Mass Reply
  • Auto retweet by Hashtags
  • Quick share tweets
  • Auto retweet
  • Twitter Scraper
  • RSS to Twitter
  • Web to Twitter

  • Manage your posts
